lyric: 制作人 : 杨武韬
作曲 : 杨武韬
编曲 : 杨武韬
作词 : 园田健太郎/Ayako Kawai
英语作词：Ayako Kawai
录音制作：Kay Production
录音制作人：河原岭旭/李英姿
录音棚：Kay Production Studio
录音师：滑川高广
混音/母带：刘巍
演唱：长谷川大祐
The flaming star Shooting far beyond the sky
translation: 在天空的尽头 燃烧的星辰啊

lyric: Oh won't you light our path,
Shine bright on high, show us the way
I see it in you, proof of your bravery
translation: 正义是永不泯灭的勇气

lyric: A bravery that never dies is the true meaning of justice
translation: 而你也拥有 勇者的证明

lyric: The deep darkness swallowing up this world
It's time to rip them all apart(leave them all behind) now!
translation: 这片黑暗 （由我来）驱逐 上啊

lyric: No matter how many scars I will bear
translation: （为了守护）众人所祈求的未来

lyric: To defend the hopes and future of the just
No matter how many times it takes, I will rise
translation: 无论多少次 （我）都会站起来

lyric: There'll be no surrender!
Tell me that you can see too
Promises we made together
Shining brighter than any star
High up above in the sky of the new dawn
Can you feel it?
That you are not alone
So spread your wings from your heart and, fly!
To the forces of evil, hear my voice
translation: （我）不会屈服于邪恶 拱手相让

lyric: This place of beauty and justice
There is no way you will ever set foot here inside
Make your decision
Conquering evil despair,
This is the judgment of justice
No matter where, go boldly,
Carrying their just wishes, all on my back
No matter how many scars I will bear
translation: （为了守护）众人所祈求的未来

lyric: To defend the hopes and future of the just
No matter how many times it takes, I will rise
translation: 无论多少次 （我）都会站起来

lyric: There'll be no surrender!
Tell me that you can see too
Promises we made together
Shining brighter than any star
High up above in the sky of the new dawn
